servinfo.title: Front Wheel Encoder On-Vehicle Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Wheel Speed Sensor Removal and Installation

servinfo.ptxt: Before inspect front wheel encoder, remove front drive shaft or front wheel spindle referring to Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Front or Front Wheel Hub Assembly Removal and Installation .

item.ptxt: Check encoder (1) for being crack, damaged or deformed.
Turn wheel and check if encoder rotation is free from eccentricity and looseness.
Check that no foreign material is attached.

servinfo.ptxt: If any faulty is found, repair or replace.
